content.text: is designed to summarize billing usage data from multiple sources, specifically focusing on meter billing and electric consumption. It aggregates data into two categories: "MB Original Bills" and "MB Adjustment Bills," based on whether the billing period matches the current processing period and whether there have been revisions. The complexity of this view is considered medium due to the following factors:
: The view uses a UNION ALL to combine two distinct queries, each with multiple joins and aggregations.
: It relies on three tables and one view, which increases the complexity of understanding the data flow.
: The use of subqueries, conditional logic, and multiple aggregations adds to the complexity.
